mapper.select: SELECT info.id,softwareName,APKName,softwareSize,info.flatformId,dic.valueName, (SELECT valueName FROM data_dictionary WHERE typeCode = 'APP_STATUS' AND valueId = `status`) AS statsName, info.status,categoryName, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE id = info.categoryLevel2) AS cateGoryName2, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE id = info.categoryLevel3) AS cateGoryName3, downloads, (SELECT versionNo FROM app_version WHERE app_version.id = info.versionId) AS versionNo, info.versionId FROM app_info AS info INNER JOIN data_dictionary AS dic ON dic.typeCode = 'APP_FLATFORM' AND dic.valueId = info.flatformId INNER JOIN app_category AS cate ON info.categoryLevel1 = cate.id
